title: Problem 2127_B
statement: Mani has locked Hamid in a 1 × n grid. Initially, some cells of the grid contain walls and the rest are empty, and Hamid is in an empty cell.In each day, the following events happen in order: Mani selects an empty cell and builds a wall in that cell.
